code: @Override public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     HiveContext hiveContext = resolveHiveContext().     String sql = exchange.getIn().getBody(String.class).     Dataset<Row> resultFrame = hiveContext.sql(sql).     exchange.getIn().setBody(getEndpoint().isCollect() ? resultFrame.collectAsList() : resultFrame.count()). }

// Helpers protected HiveContext resolveHiveContext() {     Set<HiveContext> hiveContexts = getEndpoint().getComponent().getCamelContext().getRegistry().findByType(HiveContext.class).     if (hiveContexts.size() == 1) {         return hiveContexts.iterator().next().     }     return null. }
